entries.journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith seems to have information that might help you find Brody Johnson.
entries.journal_entry_title: Johnson Smith Helps You Find Brody
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith tells you to go investigate Brody Johnson's campsite and see if you can find anything.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You found a pendant on someone's remains at the campsite. Return to Johnson Smith and show it to him.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith tells you that the pendant you found was Brody's. Return to Mada Johnson in Kachirho and let her know what you've found.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: According to Mada Johnson, the pendant you found is similar to the one Brody wore, but isn't his.  She asks you to confront Johnson Smith and find out what's going on.
